Twitter

Brief: Twitter is a quintessential social networking and microblogging service that has revolutionized the way we share and consume information. With its launch in July 2006, Twitter quickly rose to prominence by allowing users to post and interact through 'tweets' â€” messages limited initially to 140 characters. This platform has since become a global hub for real-time news, social interaction, and public discourse.
